target: But if you had to choose one thing, what would it be?
src:
What is your best experience from your previous jobs?
I don't know, it is hard to tell. there is not necessarily only one thing that i have enjoyed more than anything else.

target: What is you favourite thing to bake?
src:
What makes you a good fit?
I like to bake things, and to get up early in the morning.

target: All employees get 20 percent of on all articles.
src:
Is there anything you want to ask about this job?
Do I get any discounts in the store?

target: The job requires you to work for five days a week.
src:
Is there anything you want to ask about this job?
How many days a week should I work?

target: I see. can you give an example of a situation where it was difficult to do so?
src:
You have applied for the job as it-support of our office. what makes you a good fit?
I like to clean and fix computers and i am very careful and efficent.

target: Yes, you can be a senior baker where you can participate in product development of limited edition artisan pastries sooner or later, depending on your performance.
src:
Is there anything you want to ask about this job?
Is there any opportunity for growth with your company within three years?

target: We package coffee and coco beans.
src:
Is there anything you want to ask about this job?
What products do you have in ou warehouse?

target: That sounds good, but why did you leave your job in your home country?
src:
If you are going to work as a baker, it is good if you have experience from working with others. Can you tell me a little if you have such experience?
I have a junior baker with me back in my home country and we worked together for three years.

target: What are you most experienced in cars, the electric-powered or gasoline-powered?
src:
You have applied for the job as car mechanic. What do you think is interesting about this work?
I'm passionate about cars. It's interesting to know that I can help people to save their cars.

target: Are you comfortable working with a codriver?
src:
If you are going to work at our cargo company, it is good if you have experience from working with others. Can you tell me a little if you have such experience?
Yes. I have a codriver working with me where we exchange shifts during more than eight-hour-long drives.

target: No, everything you need will be available at the bakery.
src:
Is there anything you want to ask about this job?
Do I have to buy and bring my own equipment to the bakery?

target: What kind of projects did you do?
src:
If you are going to work as a police officer, it is good if you have experience from working with others. can you tell me a little if you have such experience?
I worked in an office when i was 20. we did projects together all the time.

target: You will always be compensated for overtime when you work here.
src:
What is the most important for you in a management position?
That responsabilites and authorities correspond.
Yes you will have a proper job description. anything else?
Is overtime financially compensated or do you offer an extra week of vacation?

target: Do you like to shop yourself?
src:
You have applied for the job as a retail worker. What do you think is interesting about this job?
I like to make things look nice in the store. All clothes should be neatly folded.

target: I see. can you give describe a situation where it was difficult to do so?
src:
You have applied for the job as manager for our customer support. what makes you a good fit?
I am good at organizing and communication with people and administration.

target: I see. can you give an example of a situation where it was difficult to do so?
src:
You have applied for the job as controller. what makes you a good fit?
I like figures and am well organised. i always deliver on time.

target: I see. can you give an example of a situation where it was difficult to do so?
src:
You have applied for the job as controller. what makes you a good fit?
I like figures and is well organised. i always deliver on time.

target: Why did you quit that job?
src:
If you are going to work in our warehouse, it is good if you have experience from working with others. Can you tell me a little if you have such experience?
I have worked in a similar warehouse before, with around ten colleagues.

target: Do you have experience doing inventory work on a computer or manually?
src:
You have applied for the job as a warehouse hand. What do you think is interesting about this work?
I like to work on administrative tasks in inventory controls.

target: That's nice. How's your experience with electric cars?
src:
What is your best experience from your previous jobs?
My best experience is when I got my hands on my first electric car repair.

target: I am wondering if you think of yourself as a social person?
src:
What makes you a good shop clerk?
I am organised and have a good memory, so i am good at helping customers find what they are looking for.
That sounds good. and how are you with people?
In what way?

target: Tell me a little more about what was good about that.
src:
What's your best experience from your previous jobs?
In my second job at ikea i had a really nice manager that i clicked with.

target: Only occasionally. we try to keep it to a minimum! anything else?
src:
You have applied for the job as waiter. what makes you a good fit?
I am observant and have a good memory
I see. can you give an example of a situation where it was difficult to do so?
Once i had a customer that changed his order, and forgot that the order was changed. he was very upset that he did not remember that. i managed to remember him about the change.
Is there anything you want to ask about this job?
Is there a need for working overtime? i have small children and can have difficulties with that.

target: Will you accept a trial period of 6 months?
src:
What make you think you will be a good fireman?
I have a good physique and i have no problems working night shifts.
Do you have a family?
Yes a wife and two children
Have you any experience before?
Yes, but not from this area
